synopsis.text: Upon the brink of parenthood, Miaka and Taka, a happily married couple, find their blissful life threatened by the arrival of a young, infatuated girl named Mayo. Obsessed with Taka, Mayo delves into the mystical Universe of the Four Gods, intending to harness the power of Suzaku to claim Taka and Miaka's unborn child as her own. As Taka's past world collides with his present, he must embark on a perilous journey back to the realm of the gods to safeguard his family and the kingdom from Mayo's malevolent intentions. With the fate of his loved ones and the entire kingdom hanging in the balance, Taka must confront the challenges that lie ahead and restore harmony to the world of the gods.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
